patthana18.28:4.1: Saraṇaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.28:4.2: Araṇaṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.28:5.1: Hetuyā dve … pe … aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate dve.
